title: Potionomics Directly Download
description:
After the untimely death of her uncle, a penniless witch named Sylvia finds herself thrust into the role of potion proprietor. It’s all up to her to carry on her uncle’s legacy and keep his potion shop afloat. Thankfully, she won’t have to go it alone. With help from some new friends, Sylvia must hone her negotiation skills, outsell her craftiest competitors, and make her shop THE number-one potion destination in Rafta.
It’s all about mastering the finer points of Potionomics Negotiations can be tense when every coin counts, but you’ll manage Sylvia’s stress with ease by playing your cards right. Develop friendships with adventurers and other shopkeepers on Rafta to learn even more advanced negotiation tactics.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 2.7 GHz
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 Ti or AMD HD 7850
